document.full_text: a u.s.-based unit of terumo corp said it has entered into a consent decree with the u.s. food and drug administration and agreed to stop selling two of its products used in cardiopulmonary bypass surgery.
document.title: terumo to stop selling two cardiac products in us
lines_and_colors: a u.s.-based unit of terumo corp said it has entered into a consent decree with the u.s. food and drug administration and agreed to stop selling two of its products used in cardiopulmonary bypass surgery.
